title: LRD user adds a custom language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the LRD user has added a clause to the individual contract 
AND has clicked the language dropdown for the clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects custom from the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will appear in the contract form

title: User uses WISYWIG editor
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [T79583]
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in the WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to use the WISYWIG editor to construct custom language using basic formatting such as italics, bolding, underlining and bullet points.

title: Use format that is not supported in printing
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is using the WISYWIG editor to add custom language to a clause
custom_steps: WHEN they look that the options to format the text in the WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN any formats that are not supported in Printing should not be an option for them to select

title: Navigate away from and back to Custom Language
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is using the WISYWIG editor to add custom language to a clause
AND has added text in to the WISYWIG editor
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a stored language in the language dropdown for the clause
AND then navigates back to Custom language in the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN any previously entered data will display

title: LRD user can copy and paste from MS word into WISYWIG editor- CUSTOM LANGUAGE
custom_preconds: GIVEN the WISYWIG editor has appeared for the LRD user from [C63004]
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user copies and pastes text from MS word in to WISYWIG editor
custom_expected: THEN the format of the text from MS word will remain the same and copy/paste is successful

title: Spanish Language and special characters
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is using the WISYWIG editor for a custom language on a clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in Spanish language and special characters
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will accommodate the Spanish language and the special characters

title: User uploads a file
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks browse
custom_expected: THEN the system opens a window that allows the user to select the file desired

title: User selects file
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C64382]
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the desired file
custom_expected:
THEN the system uploads the file to the system and it displays in the "Attached Files" area 
AND the system populates the "Last Modified" column with the current date and time

title: Loading Sign for file Upload
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is uploading a file
custom_steps: WHEN the upload is not immediate
custom_expected: THEN the loading indicator will show next to the filename

title: No Loading Sign for file Upload
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is uploading a file
custom_steps: AND the upload is immediate
custom_expected: THEN the loading indicator will not display

title: Add labels to a file uploaded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has uploaded a file
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects one or more labels from the label column
custom_expected: THEN the system will display all labels selected by the user

title: BOC user can view Approval items
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a BOC user wants to view a listing of any Approvals items
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in and views their homepage
custom_expected: THEN the system displays Approvals widget that contains pending approval items

title: BOC can open Player Profile from clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user is viewing the Approvals Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Player's Name hyperlink under "Player" column
custom_expected: THEN Player Profile is opened in the same window

title: BOC user can view comments
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a contract has comments within the general comments section and bubble is present
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over comments bubble
custom_expected: THEN comments are displayed

title: BOC user can view flags
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains Flags and a flag icon is present
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over flag icon
custom_expected: THEN the associated flag set that is contained in the form is displayed

title: LRD user can view contracts that need attention to in one place
custom_preconds: GIVEN that LRD wants to view contracts that need attention
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in and views homepage
custom_expected: THEN approvals clipboard contains contracts in Terms Submitted, Pending Approval, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) states only

title: LRD user can open contracts that need attention to
custom_preconds: GIVEN that LRD user wants to open a contract that needs attention
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Type" from Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN contract is opened in either view or edit mode

*Test Terms Submitted, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), and  Pending Approval states before approving*

title: LRD user can review Club submissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a club submitted a contract to the LRD
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is in Terms Submitted, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), or any Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN the LRD user is notified and can open and review contract

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Terms Submitted (LRD)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an LRD user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is moved to Terms Submitted state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals Widget

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) (LRD)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract moves to a Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approval items clipboard

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (LRD)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract reaches a Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals widget

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Terms Submitted (club)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an club user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is moved to Terms Submitted state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals Widget

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) (club)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract moves to a Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approval items clipboard

title: LRD user receives Approval Items- Pending Approval (CLUB)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Club user has created a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract reaches a Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the LRD's Approvals widget

title: Paperclip icon on Approvals clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the item is located on the approvals clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN the item has one or more attachments added on its form
custom_expected: THEN a paperclip icon will appear on the approvals clipboard

title: Hover over Paperclip Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the approvals clipboard has a paperclip icon
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers over the paperclip icon
custom_expected: THEN nothing will happen

title: Click on Paperclip when there's one attachment
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the approvals clipboard has one attachment on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the paperclip icon
custom_expected: THEN the attachment on the form will immediately download

title: Click on paperclip when theres more than one attachment
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the approvals clipboard has more than one attachment on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the paperclip icon
custom_expected: THEN a open a pop-up that will allow the user to choose which file to download. Clicking on the label(s) in the pop-up will download the selected file.

title: Items to drop off clipboard- Terms submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the Approvals Clipboard is in the Terms Submitted State
custom_steps: WHEN the item is moved from Terms Submitted to any other state
custom_expected: THEN the item will drop off the clipboard

title: Items to drop off approvals clipboard- Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the Approvals Clipboard is in the Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_steps: WHEN the item is moved from Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) to any other state
custom_expected: THEN the item will drop off the clipboard

title: Items to drop off approvals clipboard- Pending Approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN an item on the Approvals Clipboard is in the Pending Approval state
custom_steps: WHEN the item is moved from Pending Approval  to any other state
custom_expected: THEN the item will drop off the clipboard

title: User can quickly search for Professional Player (Backlog)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to find a professional player quickly
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "Professional Player" from quick search dropdown 
AND types in three characters
custom_expected:
THEN search results are displayed

*Last names first, then first names, in alphabetic order*

title: User can open player profile from search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to open player profile from search 
[C64683]
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on players name from search results
custom_expected: THEN player profile opens to be viewed and loads with the fixed header displayed at the top of the page

title: MJ/MN amount exceeds tendered amount *
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains a MJ/MN amount that exceeds the tendered amounts for non-SAE. split contract players
custom_steps: WHEN "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Max salary cut rule
custom_preconds: GIVEN the max salary cut rule is not met (ex. Enter amount < player's previous year salary for major league compensation Base and Guaranteed Salary i.e. $100)
custom_steps: WHEN "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Pay schedules
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has pay schedules
custom_steps:
WHEN a contract contains pay schedules for a few years but not all
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Award or Performance bonuses
custom_preconds: GIVEN contract has award and/or performance bonuses
custom_steps:
WHEN a contract has award and/or performance bonuses for some but not all years
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Player appearances
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains a performance bonus with a criteria of Player Apperances
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for player appearances are greater than or equal to 750
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Innings pitched
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a performance bonus with a criteria of Innings Pitched
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for innings pitched is greater than or equal to 250 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Games or Games started
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a performance bonus with a criteria of Games or Games Started
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for Games or Games Started has a POS greater than or equal to 162 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Game or Games pitched
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a performance bonus with a criteria of Games or Games Started
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for Games or Games Pitched has a RP greater than or equal to 100
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Threshold Games finished
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a performance bonus with the criteria of Games Finished
custom_steps:
WHEN the threshold for games finished is greater than or equal to 100 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Signing date more than a month BEFORE current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a signing date before the current date
custom_steps:
WHEN the signing date of a contract is more than a month before the current date 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Signing date more than a month AFTER current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a signing date after the current date
custom_steps:
WHEN a contract has a signing date more than a month after the current date 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Reserve roster numbers *
Active roster numbers *
Terms Submitted > Ready for Signature
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract in the Terms Submitted state
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to move contract to Ready for Signature without correcting current flag 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Ready for Signature > Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is in Ready for Signature
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to move contract to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed) without correcting current flag
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to move contract to Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not) without correcting current flag 
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Update Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to move contract to Pending Approval (confirmed or not) without correcting current flag
AND "Ignore and Continue" is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Ready for Signature or Terms Submitted > Preliminary
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Ready for Signature or Terms Submitted
custom_steps: WHEN a user wants to move a contract back to Preliminary
custom_expected: THEN the flag is removed

title: Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Approved or Approved for next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract in Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps:
WHEN a user attempts to Approve contract for this year or next
AND user clicks "Ignore and Continue" on flag pop-over
custom_expected:
THEN flag is removed
AND contract is approved

title: Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed) > Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract that is Read for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_steps: WHEN a user moves contract back to Terms Confirmed
custom_expected: THEN flag is removed

title: LRD can view players current or previous contracts on Contracts Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a Professional Players profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the tab will load displaying the Contracts history widget which displays the information of any current or previous contracts that the player has in the system

title: Club can view players current and previous contracts on Contracts Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a Professional Players profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the tab will load displaying the Contracts history widget which displays the information of any current or previous contracts that the player has in the system

title: LRD can view players preliminary contract on Contract Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Professional Player has had a preliminary contract created and saved
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Players profile and clicks the contract tab
custom_expected:
THEN the preliminary profile will be on the Contract History Widget in red text 
AND 'Year' and 'Contract level' columns will be frozen

title: Club from signing org  can view players preliminary contract on contract history
custom_preconds: GIVEN the professional player has had a preliminary contract created and saved and the club user is FROM THE SIGNING ORG
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the players profile clicks the contract tab
custom_expected: THEN the preliminary contract will display on the contract history widget in red text

title: LRD opens preliminary contract from Contract History Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player has a preliminary contract in the system and the user is on the player's contract tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the preliminary contract year or contract level in the contract history widget
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode

title: Club from signing org can open a players preliminary contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the player has a preliminary contract in the system 
AND the club user is from the signing org
AND is on the player's contract tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the preliminary contract year or contract level in the contract history widget
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode

title: LRD/BOC can view any contract in any state
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a contract entered in the system
custom_steps: WHEN LRD/BOC user attempts to view contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract is displayed

title: Club has permission to view contract if its from their signing org
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a contract entered in the system
custom_steps:
WHEN club user attempts to view contract
AND club user is from the Signing Club
custom_expected: THEN the contract is displayed

title: Club has permission to view contract for any signing org once state is terms confirmed or approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a contract entered in the system
custom_steps:
WHEN club user attempts to view contract
AND club user is not from Signing Club
AND contract state is Terms Confirmed or Approved
custom_expected: THEN the contract is displayed

title: Club does not have permission to view contract for other signing orgs before state is terms confirmed or approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a contract entered in the system
custom_steps:
WHEN club user attempts to view contract
AND club user is not from Signing Club
AND contract is not in Terms confirmed or Approved State
custom_expected: THEN the club user is prevented from viewing contract

title: Create New Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to a Professional Profile and has clicked the Contract History Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user views the Contract history widget
custom_expected: THEN they will see a Create New button

title: Click Create New button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Contract History of a Professional Player
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Create New button
custom_expected: THEN a popover will display and allow for selection of the type of new contract or other documents that the user wants to create

title: Selects Major Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Create New button on the Contract History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary contract for the same player will be launched

title: User does not have permissions to create contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user does not have permissions to create anything new for a professional Player
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Contract History widget of a player
custom_expected: THEN they will not see the create new button on the contract history widget

title: User Clicks Pay SCH button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add a Payment schedule to the contract they are creating
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Pay SCH button
custom_expected: THEN the system will open a Payment scheduler pop up

title: User calculates Payment amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on Pay SCH
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates Principal Amount and Interest Rate and clicks Calc
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Payment Amount Field

title: User calculates Interest Rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has  clicked Pay SCH on a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates Principal Amount and Payment Amount and clicks Calc
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Interest Rate field

title: User calculates Principal Amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Pay SCH on a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates Interest Rate and Payment Amount and clicks Calc
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Principal Amount field

title: User clicks OK
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has filled out all required fields on the Payment schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks OK
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and stores the values 
AND the user is returned to the Contract with the Pay SCH button updated to blue to reflect that a Payment schedule has been entered

title: User clicks cancel
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has opened a Pay schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks cancel
custom_expected: THEN none of the entered values will be saves and no update to the Pay SCH button.

title: Pay Schedule Opens with existing payments
custom_preconds: GIVEN payments already exist for a specific contract
custom_steps: WHEN user opens a Payment Schedule for the contract in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN existing payments should display in the payment schedule

title: Pay Schedule Opens without existing payments
custom_preconds: GIVEN no payments already exist for a specific contract
custom_steps: WHEN user opens Payment Schedule for the contract in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN payment schedule should show a blank row by default
